Magic
Magic Notes:
Art Of Magic: +1 character level for max spell level
Blood Talisman: Reduce Blood-Syphoning spell energy cost by 1
Ignore Armor: Reduce arcane spell failure by 50%
Blood-Syphoning: Spend 2 spell energy to have attack deliver Vampiric Touch and syphon 1d4+10 spell energy
Death Knell: Touched w/negative HP dies, giving 1d8 HP, +2 Str, +1 caster level, 1d4 spell energy (12 max) for 10*target HD min (DC 14 Will neg) 3/dy
Deathwatch: R30' cone Reveals state of targets for 100 min 3/dy, 1 spell energy per additional use
Spell-Syphoning: Blood-syphoning transfers spell from target to self or, with grapple, allows use of target spell energy
